          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az "üres" palack</string>
            <string language="en-US">Empty bottle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leere Flasche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bouteille vide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frasco vazio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bottiglia vuota</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κενό μπουκάλι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Botella vacía</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Egy levegővel teli palack a vízbe merül, miközben buborékok keletkeznek</string>
            <string language="en-US">A bottle full of air sinks into the water, while bubbles are coming out</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kisérlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">levegő</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">víz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">halmazállapot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">buborék</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">légnyomás</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Flasche voll Luft sinkt in das Wasser, 
während Luftblasen herauskommen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une bouteille complètement d'air descend dans 
l'eau, alors que les bulles sortent</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um frasco completamente do ar afunda-se na água,
quando as bolhas saírem</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una bottiglia in pieno di aria si affonda 
nell'acqua, mentre le bolle stanno uscendo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σύνολο μπουκαλιών του αέρα βυθίζει στο ύδωρ, 
ενώ οι φυσαλίδες βγαίνουν</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una botella de aire se hunde por completo en el 
agua, mientras que están saliendo las burbujas</string>
          </description>
        </general>
